title.rendered: Market Leader & Inman Connect Present: Zero to 50+ Transactions in One Year

content.rendered:
We’re having a great time here at Inman Connect 2017 in San Fransisco! Tomorrow, our own Scott Smith will be interviewing and sharing the secrets behind Aubie Pouncey’s strategy that leverages the power of CRM and automated marketing, and drove his business from zero to 50+ transactions in his first year. 

Market Leader is a proud sponsor of the ICSF Marketing Intensive Track this year and we are beyond excited to dive deep into real estate marketing with you the next few days.

Be sure to stop by ICSF 17 Continental Ballroom 4 at 4:35 PM tomorrow to catch Scott and Aubie live!

For a deep dive into Aubie’s proven marketing plan for success, “The Pouncey Plan,” check out our webinar recording –
“From Zero to 50+ Transactions in 18 Months” to learn: 

  • The power of CRM & prospect insight
  • The Pouncey Plan – Aubie’s proven marketing plan for success
  • How to understand the consumer timeline and process
  • The importance of a true marketing plan & the right marketing software
  • Challenges in today’s real estate landscape – how react and plan accordingly

    •  

     

    Get a Guaranteed Quantity of Leads!

    With Market Leader, you can get a guaranteed number of leads in your desired areas every month. These leads are exclusive — not shared with other agents. Lead inventory is limited, so check availability today!

    Check Lead Availability
